summary: "Animal Farm" is a short story by George Orwell, published in 1945. It's about farm animals who overthrow their human owner to create a fair and happy society. However, a pig named Napoleon takes control and makes the farm even worse than before. Orwell wrote this story to criticize Joseph Stalin and the Soviet Union, showing how power can be abused. The book was popular and is considered an important work of literature, even winning awards.
title: Animal Farm
